home.title: Resistor Calculator
home.instructions: Select the number of bands, then choose colors for each band to calculate resistance.

vision.title: Scan Resistor
vision.alignResistor: Align the resistor in the green frame
vision.needMoreBands: Detected only {{count}} bands (need at least 3). Move camera closer to resistor.
vision.resistorNotDetected: Resistor not detected. Make sure the resistor is clearly visible in the frame.
vision.noBandsDetected: No bands detected. Make sure the resistor is clearly visible.
vision.cameraPermissionMessage: Please enable camera access in settings to use this feature.
vision.cameraRestricted: Camera access is restricted. Please check your device settings.

instructions.step1: Place resistor in the green frame
instructions.step2: Make sure there is good lighting

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Resistor Vision respects the privacy of users of its mobile application.
privacy.section1Text: Resistor Vision does not collect, store or process any personal data of users.
privacy.section2Text: All data created in the application (such as theme preferences or detected resistor values) is stored locally on the user's device and is not sent to external servers.
privacy.section3Text: The application requires access to the device camera solely for the purpose of recognizing resistor color bands. Photos are processed locally on the device and are not transmitted, saved, or shared with any third parties.
privacy.section4Text: Resistor Vision does not sell, rent or share any user data with third parties.
privacy.section5Text: The application uses a machine learning model (TensorFlow Lite) for color recognition, which operates completely offline on the user's device. No external services are used that collect user data.
privacy.section6Text: Resistor Vision does not transmit any user data over the internet. All operations are performed locally on the device.
privacy.section7Text: This privacy policy may be updated if the functionality of the application changes. Any updates will be reflected in the application.
privacy.section8Text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.
